description:
Time for a new chain? This reliable option is compatible with 6, 7 and 8-speed drivetrains.

  • High pin power for a reliable chain that won't snap
  • Inner and outer plates features chamfering to help with shifting
  • Compatible with 6, 7 and 8-speed drivetrains
name: KMC Z8.1 6/7/8 Speed Chain
